welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Geilenkirchen! This charming city is known for its rich history, picturesque streets, and friendly locals. We invite you to discover and indulge in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
